Gbenga Adeboye (30 Septemba 1959 30 Eprel 2003) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na'eme ihe ngosi redio na onye isi ememe.
A mụrụ Elijah Oluwagbemiga Adeboye na 30 Septemba 1959 na Odeomu, Osun Steeti, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria

Adeboye bụ onye isi na-akwado mmemme redio a ma ama nke e gosipụtara na Lagos Steeti Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mbido afọ 1980 ebe ọ nwetara aha ezinụlọ Funwontan Oduology. Gbenga adeboye kọwara dị ka onye na-eme ihe ọchị nke na-emesapụ aka site n'aka onye na-ese ihe nkiri Naijiria, Idowu Philips onye ụgbọ ala mbụ ya bụ onyinye sitere n'aka ndị na-eme egwuregwu. Ndị na-akwado ya kọwakwara ya dị ka onye ahịa na onye na-eme Oduology ọdịnala tupu ya anwụọ n'ọrịa metụtara akụrụ na 30 Eprel 2003.
